message.body: At Sansa's visit last night,your tech asked what food we R feeding her.Switched from Purina Pro Plan cause the food sourcing from China thing.Just started Weg's Simply From Nature.R U still feeding your dogs the Pro Plan?What do think of Weg's brand?

Years ago when Wegmans came in and spoke to us about recommending their food they did mention that is was made by Purina. Another brand which seems to get good reviews is the brand sold by Tractor Supply. If you are looking for a brand with the highest quality control (and probably highest priced) then I would look at Royal Canin
thank you so much good to know
But are you still feeding your dogs the pro plan or have you switched?
I switch on occasion between the Pro Plan and Tractor Supply brand depending on sales and which store(s) I am close to when I need to buy
I forwarded the info on Class Reunion to your email
Thanks for the info on reunion unfortunately I will be flying out to meet Tom in San Fran the morning of the 17th & on to Elk Cove.
Would be nice to get together at another time over a few drinks sometime!!
Let's be sure to schedule that soon.
